original_text: Then Moses said, “You have been set apart to the Lord today, for you were against your own sons and brothers, and he has blessed you this day.”
korean_text: 모세가 이르되 각 사람이 자기의 아들과 자기의 형제를 쳤으니 오늘 여호와께 헌신하게 되었느니라 그가 오늘 너희에게 복을 내리시리라

sentences.original_text: You have been set apart to the Lord today
for you were against your own sons and brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 자기 아들들과 형제들을 대적했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and he has blessed you this day
